Whosoever<S>3956</S> believeth<S>4100</S> that<S>3754</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> is<S>2076</S> the Christ<S>5547</S> is born<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S>: and<S>2532</S> every one<S>3956</S> that loveth<S>25</S> him that begat<S>1080</S> loveth<S>25</S> him also<S>2532</S> that is begotten<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> him<S>846</S>.
By<S>1722</S> this<S>5129</S> we know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> we love<S>25</S> the children<S>5043</S> of God<S>2316</S>, when<S>3752</S> we love<S>25</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> keep<S>5083</S> his<S>846</S> commandments<S>1785</S>.
For<S>1063</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the love<S>26</S> of God<S>2316</S>, that<S>2443</S> we keep<S>5083</S> his<S>846</S> commandments<S>1785</S>: and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> commandments<S>1785</S> are<S>1526</S> not<S>3756</S> grievous<S>926</S>.
For<S>3754</S> whatsoever<S>3956</S> is born<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S> overcometh<S>3528</S> the world<S>2889</S>: and<S>2532</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the victory<S>3529</S> that overcometh<S>3528</S> the world<S>2889</S>, even our<S>2257</S> faith<S>4102</S>.
Who<S>5101</S> is<S>2076</S> he that overcometh<S>3528</S> the world<S>2889</S>, but<S>1508</S> he that believeth<S>4100</S> that<S>3754</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> is<S>2076</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>?
This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> he that came<S>2064</S> by<S>1223</S> water<S>5204</S> and<S>2532</S> blood<S>129</S>, even Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>; not<S>3756</S> by<S>1722</S> water<S>5204</S> only<S>3440</S>, but<S>235</S> by<S>1722</S> water<S>5204</S> and<S>2532</S> blood<S>129</S>. And<S>2532</S> it is<S>2076</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> that beareth witness<S>3140</S>, because<S>3754</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> is<S>2076</S> truth<S>225</S>.
For<S>3754</S> there are<S>1526</S> three<S>5140</S> that bear record<S>3140</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, the Father<S>3962</S>, the Word<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>: and<S>2532</S> these<S>3778</S> three<S>5140</S> are<S>1526</S> one<S>1520</S>.
And<S>2532</S> there are<S>1526</S> three<S>5140</S> that bear witness<S>3140</S> in<S>1722</S> earth<S>1093</S>, the spirit<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> the water<S>5204</S>, and<S>2532</S> the blood<S>129</S>: and<S>2532</S> these three<S>5140</S> agree<S>1526</S> in<S>1519</S> one<S>1520</S>.
If<S>1487</S> we receive<S>2983</S> the witness<S>3141</S> of men<S>444</S>, the witness<S>3141</S> of God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> greater<S>3187</S>: for<S>3754</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the witness<S>3141</S> of God<S>2316</S> which<S>3739</S> he hath testified<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S>.
He that believeth<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S> hath<S>2192</S> the witness<S>3141</S> in<S>1722</S> himself<S>1438</S>: he that believeth<S>4100</S> not<S>3361</S> God<S>2316</S> hath made<S>4160</S> him<S>846</S> a liar<S>5583</S>; because<S>3754</S> he believeth<S>4100</S> not<S>3756</S> <S>1519</S> the record<S>3141</S> that<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> gave<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S>.
And<S>2532</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the record<S>3141</S>, that<S>3754</S> God<S>2316</S> hath given<S>1325</S> to us<S>2254</S> eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>, and<S>2532</S> this<S>3778</S> life<S>2222</S> is<S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S>.
He that hath<S>2192</S> the Son<S>5207</S> hath<S>2192</S> life<S>2222</S>; and he that hath<S>2192</S> not<S>3361</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S> hath<S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> life<S>2222</S>.
These things<S>5023</S> have I written<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S> that believe<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>; that<S>2443</S> ye may know<S>1492</S> that ye<S>3754</S> have<S>2192</S> eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>, and<S>2532</S> that<S>2443</S> ye may believe<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the confidence<S>3954</S> that<S>3739</S> we have<S>2192</S> in<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, that<S>3754</S>, if<S>1437</S> we ask<S>154</S> any thing<S>5100</S> according<S>2596</S> to his<S>846</S> will<S>2307</S>, he heareth<S>191</S> us<S>2257</S>: <sup>in: or, concerning him</sup>
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> we know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> he hear<S>191</S> us<S>2257</S>, whatsoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> we ask<S>154</S>, we know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> we have<S>2192</S> the petitions<S>155</S> that<S>3739</S> we desired<S>154</S> of<S>3844</S> him<S>846</S>.
If<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> see<S>1492</S> his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S> sin<S>264</S> a sin<S>266</S> which is not<S>3361</S> unto<S>4314</S> death<S>2288</S>, he shall ask<S>154</S>, and<S>2532</S> he shall give<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> life<S>2222</S> for them that sin<S>264</S> not<S>3361</S> unto<S>4314</S> death<S>2288</S>. There is<S>2076</S> a sin<S>266</S> unto<S>4314</S> death<S>2288</S>: I do not<S>3756</S> say<S>3004</S> that<S>2443</S> he shall pray<S>2065</S> for<S>4012</S> it<S>1565</S>.
All<S>3956</S> unrighteousness<S>93</S> is<S>2076</S> sin<S>266</S>: and<S>2532</S> there is<S>2076</S> a sin<S>266</S> not<S>3756</S> unto<S>4314</S> death<S>2288</S>.
We know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> whosoever<S>3956</S> is born<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S> sinneth<S>264</S> not<S>3756</S>; but<S>235</S> he that is begotten<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S> keepeth<S>5083</S> himself<S>1438</S>, and<S>2532</S> that wicked one<S>4190</S> toucheth<S>680</S> him<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S>.
And we know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> we are<S>2070</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> the whole<S>3650</S> world<S>2889</S> lieth<S>2749</S> in<S>1722</S> wickedness<S>4190</S>.
And<S>1161</S> we know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S> is come<S>2240</S>, and<S>2532</S> hath given<S>1325</S> us<S>2254</S> an understanding<S>1271</S>, that<S>2443</S> we may know<S>1097</S> him that is true<S>228</S>, and<S>2532</S> we are<S>2070</S> in<S>1722</S> him that is true<S>228</S>, even in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>. This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the true<S>228</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>.
Little children<S>5040</S>, keep<S>5442</S> yourselves<S>1438</S> from<S>575</S> idols<S>1497</S>. Amen<S>281</S>.
